pages.text: Morered wires use their own logic for transmitting redstone signals. Vanilla restone dust has 16 levels of signal strength (where 0 is an unpowered wire). If you've been experimenting with morered cables, then you already know that signals can be transmitted over longer distances

than vanilla redstone dust. This is because Morered wires have 32 power levels instead of just 16. However when Morered cables transfer power to vanilla redstone components, the signal is converted to the normal 16 levels.
